item.title: Experimental Data Science
item.description: A/B Testing - When should A/B Testing not be Trusted to Make Decisions - Quora Rubin Causal Model (Wikipedia) MDE generally proportional to number of users Statistical power and Minimum Detectable Effect (MDE) MDE treated as smallest effect size (signals) you can find in your experiment with certain probability TODO Power, minimal detectable effect, and bucket size estimation in A/B tests <biblio.bib>
